chapter.title: Presentation
chapter.para: Background lets you configure a background for the main jEdit text area.
If necessary, the background image is tiled to fill the entire text area.
It's also possible to set a "tinted glass" effect thanks to the blend options.

chapter.title: Usage
chapter.para: The background image and blend options can be configured in the Background option pane in the jEdit global options: Utilities> Global Options...> Plugin Options> Background.
The accepted image formats include GIF, JPEG and PNG.
The blend options produce a "tinted glass" effect over the background image. If you check the Use color blending option, you'll have the possibility to set Blend color and the Color opacity.
The Background action (Plugins> Background) toggles the background visibility for the current text area.
